s to combine several annotations to define particular

iple threads, N executions each? That is what I loved

Right now, parallel behavior is expressed in testng.x=
ml, not in Java:

<test parallel=3D"true" thread-count=3D"5">
  <class> ...=


So far, nobody has expressed the need to specify this in the source...
